name: FunctionalStatusClinicalAssessment
title: Functional Status  Clinical Assessment
description: Person's  functional status as assessed by a clinician using a clinical assessment tool (Business ID: Entry 2742713)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Functional Status  Clinical Assessment.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an person's  functional status as assessed by a clinician using a clinical assessment tool.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Functional Status  Clinical Assessment.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Functional Status  Clinical Assessment.)
